news.title: Trump calls Putin 'crazy' after largest Russian attack on Ukraine
news.summary: In a rare rebuke, the US president says he is "not happy" with his Russian counterpart over the latest attacks.

news.title: Israeli strikes across Gaza kill 24, medics and officials say
news.summary: A school sheltering displaced families in central Gaza was among those hit, according to medics and civil defence officials.

news.title: Lilo and Stitch beat Tom Cruise in box office bonanza
news.summary: Disney's Lilo and Stitch remake and the latest Mission: Impossible become two of the year's biggest films.

news.title: HS2 investigating two firms supplying construction staff
news.summary: The company building the high-speed rail line says it takes all whistleblower allegations seriously.

news.title: King travels to support Canada as it fends off Trump
news.summary: The King and Queen will be arriving in Canada on Monday for a visit seen as a symbol of support.

news.title: North Korea arrests senior official over warship launch failure
news.summary: The Workers' Party official was "largely responsible" for the botched launch, state media said.

news.title: AI could already be conscious. Are we ready for it?
news.summary: With a leap in the evolution of large language models, some leading thinkers are questioning whether AI might become sentient

news.title: Winter fuel 'in total chaos', and Ukraine 'fury' at US
news.summary: A mix of stories lead the front pages this Bank Holiday Monday, including the government's welfare cuts.
